A1: a 100 MW turbine supply agreement with
RelatedSentence: Gamesa has signed a 100 MW turbine supply agreement with CGN Wind Energy for a wind farm being developed in the province of Yunnan , China .

The turbine maker says the scope of the agreement encompasses the supply and installation of 50 G97-2.0 MW units , specifically configured for high - altitude locations , at the Yangchajie wind complex .

Gamesa expects to fulfill the order by the last quarter of this year .
Gamesa expects to fulfill the order by the last quarter of this year .
In addition , Gamesa and CGN , a subsidiary of China 's General Nuclear Power Group , have agreed to the potential supply of another 100 MW during a second phase of the project in 2015 .
In China , Gamesa says it has installed 3.5 GW of wind power to date and currently services more than 850 MW .
